results.name: Smallest prime factor of arithmetic derivative of n or a(n)=0 if no such prime exists.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: Table[a[n], {n, 0, 105}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 23 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
